titles.title: Make Me a Channel of Blessing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Is your life a channel of blessing? Is the love of God flowing thro' you? Are you telling the lost of the Saviour? Are you ready His service to do?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Make me a channel of blessing today, Make me a channel of blessing, I pray; My life possessing, my service blessing, Make me a channel of blessing today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Is your life a channel of blessing? Are you burdened for those who are lost? Have you urged upon those who are straying, The Saviour who died on the cross?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Is your life a channel of blessing? Is it daily telling for Him? Have you spoken the Word of salvation To those who are dying in sin?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We cannot be channels of blessing If our lives are not free from known sin; We will barriers be and a hindrance To those we are trying to win.
